Reviews.Title: “Acceptable hotel for business trip”
Reviews.Author: Aaron F
Reviews.Content: hotel moderate okay business travel wireless internet soso didnt times fairly slow front desk helpful accomodating nonspanish speaker hotel bar serves food restaurant closed quality stayed hotel twice continue business travel due location

Reviews.Title: “Average accomodation for business trip”
Reviews.Author: eil83
Reviews.Content: internet extremely poor wireless doesnt reach hook ups dont water shower goes hot cold showering clean arrived clean nightly basis staff accomodating breakfast close metro hour ride downtown madrid hot sleep window loud hotel looks onto highway

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for Business Travellers”
Reviews.Author: soumiunq
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights hotel standard comfortable hotel business travellers breakfast adequate restaurant operate evening sandwitch bar bartender helpful real nice guy hotel free internet doesnt

Reviews.Title: “Not 4 star standard, a let down”
Reviews.Author: supermum_10
Reviews.Content: family stayed hotel 1 week husband business house hunting hotel little tired edges chipped bedroom furniture etc entrance cold staff effort people attending conferences guests breakfast exciting day stay butter key essential breakfast time found couple occasions breakfast time cups saucers left tables walls thin floors noisey meant hear people walking neighbouring agree reviewer smoking entrance barcafe pleasant especially child plus swimming pool roof nice poolside towels meant using towels despite saying manual

Reviews.Title: “Good for business stay, not so much for tourists”
Reviews.Author: Dorotka_BS
Reviews.Content: reviews hotel read trip poor quality hotel outdated interiors agree latter walking thru corridors barely admire modern quality improved greatly comfortable beddings fantastic bathrooms fit disadvantages terrible noise streets running window forget night similarly bad noise ac fan breakfast buffest moderate considerate amount fresh fruits short walk nearby commercial centre free shuttle hotel provided airport youre planning sightseeing thats ride metro 15h taxi

Reviews.Title: “Avoid Dinner at this hotel”
Reviews.Author: TheRoliingMcStones
Reviews.Content: hotel bit tired dated convenient surrounding business district airport busy intersection avoid roundabout unless traffic ok required business amenities tea coffee facilities lunch restaurant pretty dinner inedible served waitress willing clueless red wine stored fridge pathetic effort evening meal breakfast ok imaginative

HotelInfo.Name: Amura Alcobendas Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Avda de Valdelaparra 2, 28100 Madrid, Spain
